thread.title: SA Treasurer Tom Koutsantonis apologises for behaviour during Gillman deal, denies using offensive language towards officials
thread.title_full: SA Treasurer Tom Koutsantonis apologises for behaviour during Gillman deal, denies using offensive language towards officials - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: SA Treasurer Tom Koutsantonis apologises for behaviour during Gillman deal, denies using offensive language towards officials
text: South Australian Treasurer Tom Koutsantonis apologises for inappropriate behaviour during negotiations on a controversial land sale in 2013, during which he has been accused of using offensive language towards public officials. ...
